short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find Tradecaster's keywords on any web page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click 'show keywords' from the extension tool to reveal Sean Dekmar's keywords to look for when reading a press release. Hover over the highlighted word to reveal a popup that displays the number of stars for a keyword. 

Sometimes you need to click the button more than once.
